title: President Murmu Inaugurates IGNOU Regional Skill Centre in Odisha
summary: President Droupadi Murmu inaugurated a new IGNOU Regional Skill Centre in Odisha to promote skill-based education.

title: IGNOU Launches New Skill Courses 2026
summary: IGNOU announced new job-oriented skill courses for the 2026 admission cycle.

title: IGNOU Job Fair 2026: Big Opportunity for IGNOU Students
summary: IGNOU has announced Job Fair / Placement Drive 2026 for UG & PG students. Check eligibility, registration process, required documents and important instructions.
